page.title: 04COUNTRY PARK-EAST CARLTON
page.content: This consists of 100 acres of beautiful terrain overlooking the Welland Valley. The park offers opportunity for relax- ation and interests.It was purchased and opened by Corby District Council in 1983.Much of the parkland is devoted to picnic and "free & easy" areas with rustic tables and benches.The park boasts three nature trails through a remrkable selection of hardwoods,wild plants,and bird and pond life.The natural ponds will be used as fish hatcheries,being fed by streams flowing into the Welland.Play areas are available for children, with a cafeteria. The park is open every day, car parking and admission being free.
